title: Ancient Nutrition Ancient Nutrients Vitamin D | The Healthy Place
description: Rooted in Traditional Chinese Medicine, Ancient Nutrients Vitamin D is a whole-food approach to support healthy bones and immunity!
cleaned_text: Ancient Nutrition Ancient Nutrients Vitamin D [Ancient Nutrition](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/brand/ancient-nutrition/) Full PriceThis item is currently out of stock but is available for pre-order. Pre-orders will be charged once the item is back in stock. 60 capsules Rooted in Traditional Chinese Medicine, Ancient Nutrients Vitamin D is a one-of-a-kind, real-foods approach to sustaining optimal wellness. - Features 5000IU of organic, probiotic-fermented Vitamin D with 95mcg of Vitamin K - Aids healthy immune system function* - Enhances heart health* - Promotes strong bones* - TCM (Traditional Chinese Method) inspired - Perfect for paleo and keto diet enthusiasts - Keto, Paleo - Does not contain gluten, dairy, nuts Ancient Nutrition Ancient Nutrients Vitamin D Calling all real-food, paleo, and keto enthusiasts! This is a body-ready Vitamin D supplement like you've never seen before! Ancient Nutrients Vitamin D combines immune-boosting vitamins D + K and real-food ingredients inspired by TCM (Traditional Chinese Method) principles. This Vitamin D supplement will stand out above the rest every time because it features a 3-Kingdom Approach. What does that mean? Simply put, the formula is a balanced, three-way blend of the fungi, plant, and animal kingdoms. TCM-honoring ingredients such as bone broth, schisandra extract, and reishi mushroom balance the body's "qi" (life force) while supporting the body's systems to work synergistically together — instead of focusing on one specific organ at a time. Here are some of the highlighted features: - Probiotic-fermented Vitamin D3: Vitamin D is essential for the support of heart, bone, and tooth health while offering extended benefits critical for healthy DNA production. It encourages the absorption of bone-supporting calcium and phosphorus and is one of the best ways to support a healthy immune system. - Fermented Vitamin K2: Soy-free Vitamin K2 (MK-7) supports strong bone structure and healthy bone growth and metabolism. Yes, this is important even for adults as your bones never actually stop growing! Vitamin K2 is a powerful addition to this supplement as it helps enhance the absorption of Vitamin D3. - Organic Astragalus: Rooted in TCM, astragalus root is known as an overall health supporter. Specific benefits include boosting the immune system, supporting healthy aging, increasing energy, and promoting heart health. - Bovine liver: Derived from pasture-raised New Zealand cattle, the bovine liver in this Vitamin D supplement is a powerful superfood. It boasts high concentrations of vitamins A, D, B12, B2, B3, B5, B6, as well as omega-3s and minerals iron, folate, zinc, and more. About 75% of adults and teens in the U.S. don't get enough of this nutrient — don't let that be you! Ancient Nutrients Vitamin D is powered by fermentation and brings you one step closer to the natural health of your ancestors! Suggested Use: Adults take 1 capsule per day with 8 ounces of water or your favorite beverage. Can be taken with or without food. Cautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Consult a physician before taking this product if you are pregnant, nursing, taking any medications, or have a medical condition. Questions? We've got answers! Click the LiveChat button in the lower right hand side of your screen to start talking with one of our Wellness Consultants or [ call one of our stores](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/contact/) to speak with a member of our team. Serving Size: 1 Capsule Servings Per Container: 60 Ingredients: Vitamin D, Vitamin K (as menaquinone-7), Ancient Nutrients TCM Blend Bovine Liver, Organic Astragalus Extract, Beef Bone Broth, Chicken Bone Broth, Organic Schisandra Berry Extract, Organic Lion's Mane (Hericium erinaceus) Extract, Organic Mushroom Extract, Wild Hake Roe Other Ingredients: Saccharomyces cerevisiae, beef gelatin Ancient Nutrition creates whole-food nutritional products that are designed to power body and mind and restore us to health, strength, and vitality. Ancient Nutrition is founded and run by Jordan Rubin, one of America's most-recognized and respected natural health experts, and well as Dr. Josh Axe, who operates one of the worlds' largest natural health websites. These products are powered by ancient principles, and are created using the wisdom of Ayurveda and Traditional Chinese Herbalism that has survived generations. These methods are combined with modern research to create supplements that are rooted in traditional knowledge - and supported by science.
